Desc.entry: A voluntary, not-for-profit organisation. The forum is a meeting point for all those who reside or work in Broomhill. The aim is to bring together the component parts of the community (residents; amenity groups; schools; the universities; students; churches and faith groups; business; hospitals and voluntary organisations) to enable discussion on matters of local concern relating to the protection, development and improvement of Broomhill and promote dialogue with members and officers of the City Council, police and other public bodies, who regularly attend the forum meetings. Meetings are open to all.
